alerts.description:
There is a risk of gale-force gusts (Level 2 of 4).
Height range: > 1000 m; Max. gusts: 70-80 km/h; Wind direction: south-west; Increased gusts: in exposed locations < 90 km/h

There is a risk of wind gusts (level 1 of 4).
Height range: > 600 m; Max. gusts: ~ 55 km/h; Wind direction: south-west; Increased gusts: in exposed locations < 65 km/h

There is a risk of persistent rain (Level 2 of 4).
Precipitation amounts: ~ 70 l/m²; in windward areas: < 100 l/m²
